title: [Massive] Linear Algebra Critical Thinking Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of matrix operations, vector spaces, and linear transformations
context.additional_context: A collaborative learning environment designed to enable in-service professionals to apply linear algebra concepts to solve job-related problems

learning_goals: Learners can identify contradictions in linear algebra problems and propose alternative solution strategies
Learners can provide critical feedback on peers' problem-solving processes
Learners can logically explain the limitations of linear algebra models by analyzing real-world engineering cases
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
